thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 275 2
thread.title: Neil Marshall
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Neil Marshall

author: Neil Marshall
title: Neil Marshall
text:
Has a very good range of products at best prices, orders are always shipped promptly and if an item should be out of stock then refunds are pretty much immediate into a PayPal account.
When customer service is contacted for any reason, the reply is within a matter of hours, not days, as it might be elsewhere. The tone is always courteous and helpful and any problems are resolved quickly without any bickering.
